<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix"> <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <before>false</before> <description>DEF0237132 : Schedule a one time job which will run compactTable on sys_json_chunk</description> <name>FlowDesigner : sys_json_chunk compact</name> <record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback> <script><![CDATA[
var sysTrigger = new GlideRecord("sys_trigger"); sysTrigger.initialize(); sysTrigger.name='FD : compact table'; sysTrigger.job_id = '81c92ce9c0a8016400e5f0d2f784ea78';
var action_date = new GlideDateTime(gs.nowDateTime()); action_date.addDays(14);
sysTrigger.next_action = action_date; sysTrigger.script= 'sn_fd.FlowAPI.compactSysJsonChunk();'; sysTrigger.trigger_type = 0; sysTrigger.insert();]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>sunil.kumar@snc</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2021-09-28 22:19:01</sys_created_on> <sys_id>551d1b7277323010b599e0490e5a9994</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>FlowDesigner : sys_json_chunk compact</sys_name> <sys_package display_value="Flow Designer - Flow Engine" source="com.glide.hub.flow_engine">5ce9b4683cf1311068bcf327dfe37fda</sys_package> <sys_policy/> <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_fix_551d1b7277323010b599e0490e5a9994</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>sunil.kumar@snc</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2021-09-28 22:19:09</sys_updated_on> <unloadable>false</unloadable> </sys_script_fix> </record_update>
